issue.title: [Java] Support Java benchmark in Archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10031](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10031). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Based on [the suggestion](https://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/arrow-dev/202008.mbox/%3cCABNn7+q35j7QWsHJBX8omdewKT+F1p_M7r1_F6szs4dqc+Luyg@mail.gmail.com%3e), Ursabot will support Java benchmarks.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10031?focusedCommentId=17337608) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
